meta_description: The Zanesville Museum of Art ignites human imagination and understanding through the visual arts.
hours_text:
**Zanesville Museum of Art Hours**  
Wednesday, 10 am-5 pm  
Thursday, 10 am-7:30 pm  
Friday, 10 am-5 pm  
Saturday, 12 pm-5 pm

**Holiday Hours

CLOSED, Thursday, December 25, 2025  
CLOSED, Friday, December 26, 2025

CLOSED, Wednesday, December 31, 2025  
CLOSED, Thursday, January 1, 2026  
CLOSED, Friday, January 2, 2026  
**OPEN, Saturday, January 3, 2026**

**ZMA Office Hours**  
ZMA staff are onsite Monday-Friday, 8 am - 5 pm, except for observed holidays.

**Welcome to the Zanesville Museum of Art.** Whether you're a first-time museum visitor or a life-long member of the ZMA, here are some tips to help you make the most of your visit.

## **When you arrive...**

**Check In  
** Visit the first floor visitor services desk to check in, make a donation, inquire about a ZMA membership, or to be placed on our email list.

**Admission  
** Admission to the ZMA is free. Please help us sustain free admission and make a donation when you visit. 

## **During your visit** …

**Coats, Bags, and Umbrellas  
** A visitor services specialist will ask you to check coats, backpacks, umbrellas, shopping bags, or any bag larger than 11 x 15 x 6 inches. These items are not permitted in the galleries.

**Gallery Closures**

Second floor Great Gallery

**Restrooms  
** The ZMA has handicap accessible public restrooms on the 1st and 2nd floors that include baby changing tables.

admission_text:
**Become a Member or Renew your ZMA Membership today!**

As a member of the ZMA you have exclusive access to the museum’s rich and diverse permanent collection of American, European, and Asian art; opportunities to participate in an array of dynamic and informative educational programs; and special invitations to preview exceptional temporary exhibitions.

Browse the benefits of membership to select the membership level right for you or your family.

**If you are a member of the Artist Colony of Zanesville, you can redeem your complimentary membership**[**here**](/artcoz-memberships)**.**

* * *

INDIVIDUAL  
$30 

  * One membership card.
  * 50% discount to the ZMA's adult programs.
  * One complimentary subscription to the ZMA’s Member Bulletin.
  * Exclusive invitations to, and advance notice of, upcoming events, classes, and programs.
  * Exclusive access to the ZMA’s Longaberger Art Research Library.
  * 10% discount on ZMA store merchandise 

Give as a Gift 

Join or Renew 

* * *

HOUSEHOLD  
$55   

  * **Two** membership cards.
  * 50% discount on the ZMA's Adult **and Children's programs**
  * One complimentary subscription to the ZMA’s Member Bulletin.
  * Exclusive invitations to, and advance notice of, upcoming events, classes, and programs.
  * Exclusive access to the ZMA’s Longaberger Art Research Library.
  * **10% discount on ZMA store merchandise.**
